txt.p: Franchise sales jumped 30% after launching this revitalized brand. The new image met with overwhelming approval from franchise owners, and helped bump franchise rankings by as much as half.
Based on a 95% female, 90% residential customer base and competitor’s positions, we identified a more customer-centric brand focus for Heaven’s Best: feminine, family-friendly, clean and healthy.

We developed an internal corporate presentation for Heaven’s Best to introduce and sell the updated image to over 400 franchise owners. Buy-off was crucial, as the burden of transitioning fleet and promotional materials rested primarily with franchise owners. The presentation met with nearly unanimous support. One franchisee immediately purchased 12 new vehicles to speed his transition to the new brand.

Keeping the brand message affordable but trusted was a fine line to walk. We refined the chosen direction into a contemporary consumer brand directed at a middle-class female audience. Then we developed and oversaw the implementation of all brand elements, including copy writing, photography, advertising, fleet signage, uniforms, web site, packaging, and training materials.
